episodes.title: The Weirdest Cults In History... (Part 2)
episodes.description:
Humanity has done a lot of questionable things, but this might be the most impressive. From self-appointed messiahs and DIY religions to doomsday countdowns that never worked and “enlightenment” that somehow involved branding, poison, or fire. 

These are the weirdest cults in history, and all the proof you need that confidence beats critical thinking every single time.

--- 

If you liked this video, it wouldn't hurt to subscribe so you don't miss the next one... that would be a shame.

--- 

Chapters: 

00:00 Intro
00:21 Scientology
04:00 Ant Hill Kids
07:28 Rajneesh
11:12 Order of the Solar Temple
14:04 10 Commandments Cult
